mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`ADDRESS`, t1.`CREATE_TIME`, t1.`FAIL_RETRY_COUNT`, t1.`HANDLER`, t1.`ID`, t1.`JOB_ID`, t1.`PARAM`, t1.`TRIGGER_CODE`, t1.`TRIGGER_MSG`, t1.`TRIGGER_TYPE` FROM `JOBS_LOG` t1 ) t1 where id=#{id}
select t1.* from (SELECT t1.ADDRESS, t1.CREATE_TIME, t1.FAIL_RETRY_COUNT, t1.HANDLER, t1.ID, t1.JOB_ID, t1.PARAM, t1.TRIGGER_CODE, t1.TRIGGER_MSG, t1.TRIGGER_TYPE FROM JOBS_LOG t1 ) t1 where id=#{id}
select t1.* from (SELECT t1.ADDRESS, t1.CREATE_TIME, t1.FAIL_RETRY_COUNT, t1.HANDLER, t1.ID, t1.JOB_ID, t1.PARAM, t1.TRIGGER_CODE, t1.TRIGGER_MSG, t1.TRIGGER_TYPE FROM JOBS_LOG t1 ) t1 where id=#{id}
